name: Jeti Yeti
description:
Yeti is a yeti who lives in "somewhere" from "someplace". He has a comfortable life without interruptions and does not plan to change any of that ever! Until...

Join Yeti in the search of the lost restaurant with a promotion from another life! Donge obstacles, use your body to balance yourself on cliff, learn to master the mechanics of a broken heat tank.

Controls:

-Left and Right keysYeti is a very heavy and slippery guy, Take into account his movemnt on the ground and in the air!

-Space
Use this to make Yeti jump! Pls it also serves to select in the menu!

-Enter Yeti has a special power to restart a level when you die!

-S key 
Use this to use the heat tank. don't use it on a surface or yeti will explode!

Project for My First Game Jam: Winter 2020

  Game made in 8 days. A collaboration between 3 people!
